abstract: Noble Group, the Hong Kong commodities firm part owned by the Chinese government, said Monday that it had agreed to buy the electricity retail business jointly owned by Sempra Energy and Royal Bank of Scotland in a deal worth $582 million including debt.
snippet: Noble Group, the Hong Kong commodities firm part owned by the Chinese government, said Monday that it had agreed to buy the electricity retail business jointly owned by Sempra Energy and Royal Bank of Scotland in a deal worth $582 million includin...
lead_paragraph: Noble Group, the Hong Kong commodities firm part owned by the Chinese government, said Monday that it had agreed to buy the electricity retail business jointly owned by Sempra Energy and Royal Bank of Scotland in a deal worth $582 million, including debt.

headline.main: Noble Group to Buy R.B.S. Sempra Electricity Unit
